com.xorprogramming.io.utils

Class SavableIOUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xorprogramming.io.utils.SavableIOUtils

  • public final class SavableIOUtils
extends Object
    A utility class containing convenient methods for saving and restoring a Savable.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Steven Roberts

      • restoreFromInternalStorage

        public static void restoreFromInternalStorage(Context c,
                              Savable savable,
                              String file)
                                       throws IOException,
                                              ClassNotFoundException
        Restores a Savable from the internal storage associated with the context.
        Parameters:
        c - The context with which to open file input
        savable - The object to restore
        file - The name of the file to open; can not contain path separators.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs while reading from the stream
        ClassNotFoundException - If the class of one of the objects in the object graph cannot be found
        See Also:
        Context.openFileInput(String)

                             throws IOException,

        Restores a Savable from the cache directory of the filesystem.
        Parameters:
        c - The context with which to open cache input
        savable - The object to restore
        file - The path of the file to open relative to the cache directory
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs while reading from the stream
        ClassNotFoundException - If the class of one of the objects in the object graph cannot be found
        See Also:

      • saveToInternalStorage

        public static void saveToInternalStorage(Context c,
                         Savable savable,
                         String file,
                         int mode)
                                  throws IOException
        Saves a Savable to the internal storage associated with the context.
        Parameters:
        c - The context with which to open file output
        savable - The object to save
        file - The name of the file to open; can not contain path separators.
        mode - Operating mode. Use 0 or Context.MODE_PRIVATE for the default operation, MODE_APPEND to append to an existing file, Context.MODE_WORLD_READABLE and Context.MODE_WORLD_WRITEABLE to control permissions.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs while writing to the stream
        See Also:
        Context.openFileOutput(String, int)

        public static void saveToCahce(Context c,

               String file)
                        throws IOException
        Saves a Savable to the cache directory of the filesystem.
        Parameters:
        c - The context with which to open cache output
        savable - The object to save
        file - The path of the file to open relative to the cache directory
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs while writing to the stream
        See Also:
        Context.getCacheDir()
